tag_list: developer, php, css, html, xhtml, database, mysql
overview:
David is an experienced web developer and PHP5 Zend Certified Engineer.

He has been working with websites for over 7 years, progressing with industry standards and increasing his knowledge through books, industry sources and certification.

David has worked with a number of companies and individuals including telecoms and rescue operations and his proven problem-solving ability and diligence has provided him with interesting clients and opportunities.

Attending conferences and events David has met interesting and influential people in the industry which has lead to some exciting collaborations. With Robin Blandford David worked on Decision For Heroes which is set to change the way rescue teams are organised. With D4H David attended Seedcamp London, Europe’s largest technological startup competition, as one of 23 teams from over 380 entrants.

David is currently attending Dublin University, Trinity College and actively participating in the Irish web industry.
